attributes.action: Abolish hospital parking charges for staff
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Government or Parliament to do it because I believe it's within their power to do so.
attributes.background: I would like Parliament to step in and legislate to abolish the charges NHS staff have to pay for parking at their place of work.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about parking charges at hospitals are a matter for individual NHS trusts, not the UK Government or Parliament, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Fund free parking for all staff at NHS hospitals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631196
